- US salaries show declining trend 2023-2025 (remote globalization
- LATAM/MENA show 40-60% discount vs Western Europe but growing rapidly
- San Francisco remains highest ($237k for senior cloud engineers)
- SDET/QA automation experiencing premium compensation (24%+ for modern tools)
- AI captured 36% of digital budgets in 2025 (primary growth driver)
- Datacenter spending surge driven by AI workloads (22.6% → 32.1% of spend)
- Platform Engineering: 35% increase in adoption target (45% → 80% by 2026)
- AI Roles: Fastest growing (+109-143% YoY across specializations)
- QA Evolution: From manual testing to automation engineers requiring DSA skills (32% of postings)
- Test Framework Tools: Playwright/Cypress replacing Selenium (modern tools: 68-73% adoption)
- MENA: Strong AI adoption (74% weekly usage vs 40% Europe)
